element.name: Magic Initiate, Variant
element.prerequisite: At least 8 levels in a single spellcasting class.

p.i: Prerequisites: Ability to cast at least 1 spell and play at least 1 instrument

description.p: Choose a spellcasting class: bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, wizard

ul.li: You learn two cantrips of your choice from that class spell list and may add the appropriate spellcasting ability modifier to the damage of these two cantrips.

In addition, you learn the spell Find Familiar and, using this feat, can cast it at its lowest level to call a Pseudodragon. Once you cast it in this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it in this way again.
Your spellcasting ability for these spells depends on the class you chose: Charisma for bard, sorcerer, or warlock; Wisdom for cleric or druid; or Intelligence for wizard.

sheet.description: You learn two cantrips from a spellcasting class of your choosing, may add the respective modifiers to their damage, and can cast Find Familiar once per long rest using this feat to call a Pseudodragon.

description.p: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the bard’s spell list.
Your spellcasting ability for these spells is charisma.
You learn two cantrips of your choice from the cleric’s spell list.
Your spellcasting ability for these spells is wisdom.
You learn two cantrips of your choice from the druid spell list.
Your spellcasting ability for these spells is wisdom.
You learn two cantrips of your choice from the sorcerer’s spell list.
Your spellcasting ability for these spells is charisma.
You learn two cantrips of your choice from the warlock’s spell list.
Your spellcasting ability for these spells is charisma.
You learn two cantrips of your choice from the wizard’s spell list.
Your spellcasting ability for these spells is intelligence.
